Docs.summary: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.SizeConverter> class supports conversion of <xref:System.String> values and base values that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> class supports.
